details.description: Online tool for completing your annual farm soil management and protection review if you claim Single Payment Scheme payments
details.more_information:
This tool uses [Government Gateway](/government-gateway "Government Gateway"). 

##Getting help
Contact the Farming Advice Service if you have any queries about the SPR.

$C
**Farming Advice Service**  
0845 345 1302   
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm  

$C

##Keeping a copy on your farm
You don't have to complete the review online. Instead, you can keep a copy on your farm. Either:

+ use a [spreadsheet](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/contentdocs/08B7386AAEECC830E8025768E0058A46E "Soil Protection Review - spreadsheet template"){:rel="external"}
+ Download, print out and complete the latest version (SPR 2010)

$D
[Download 'Soil Protection Review 2010: guidance and forms' (PDF, 766KB)](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/0/c39ae2bb7b8ab8158025768e005e57cd/$FILE/Soil%20Protection%20Review%202010.pdf "Download 'Soil Protection Review 2010: guidance and forms' (PDF, 766KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Agents
Sign up as an [agent](https://secure.services.defra.gov.uk/wps/portal/wfa/!ut/p/c5/04_SB8K8xLLM9MSSzPy8xBz9CP0os3gzdx8LQyd_A0t3X3dHA08fM1fvAEdXY3cTI6B8JE55A3dDSnQbmBHQHQ5yLX7b8cmDzAfJG-AAjgb6fh75uan6BbmhEQaZAekAekimGQ!!/dl3/d3/L2dBISEvZ0FBIS9nQSEh/ "Sign up as an agent for Defra farm surveys and assessments"){:rel="external"} if you want to use the Soil Protection Review for more than one farmer.

##Cross compliance
These standards are part of [cross compliance.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/UIMenu/814240C66F10CAC8802570C7004248D4?Opendocument "Cross compliance (Rural Payments Agency)"){:rel="external"} You must meet them to get your farming subsidy under the [Single Payment Scheme](/single-payment-scheme-online "Manage your Single Payment Scheme online"). 



*[SPR]: Soil Protection Review
*[Defra]: Department for Environmental Food and Rural Affairs
*[SPS]: Single Payment Scheme
details.introduction: The Soil Protection Review (SPR) is part of [cross compliance.](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/UIMenu/814240C66F10CAC8802570C7004248D4?Opendocument "Cross compliance (Rural Payments Agency)"){:rel="external"} Completing the SPR online is quicker, easier and reduces your chances of an inspection.
